import Mathlib

/-!
Statement: Using the standard euclidean norm R^n, suppose A : L(‚Ñù, ‚Ñù^n) is defined for x : ‚Ñù by A x = x ‚Ä¢ a for a vector a : ‚Ñù^n. Then the operator norm of A equals the euclidean norm of a.
-/-

theorem operator_norm_eq_euclidean_norm {n : ‚Ñï} {a : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {A : ‚Ñù ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)}
  (h : ‚àÄ x : ‚Ñù, A x = x ‚Ä¢ a) : ‚à•A‚à• = ‚à•a‚à• := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
Suppose A : L(‚Ñù, E) is defined for x : ‚Ñù by A x = x ‚Ä¢ a for a vector a : E, where E is a normed space over ‚Ñù.
Then the operator norm of A equals the norm of a.
This specializes to the Euclidean case E = Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù (i.e. ‚Ñù^n).
-/-

theorem operator_norm_eq_norm_of_smul_linear_map {E : Type _} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]
  {a : E} {A : ‚Ñù ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] E} (h : ‚àÄ x : ‚Ñù, A x = x ‚Ä¢ a) : ‚à•A‚à• = ‚à•a‚à• := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

-- Suppose A : L(‚Ñù, E) is defined for x : ‚Ñù by A x = x ‚Ä¢ a for a vector a : E, where E is a normed space over ‚Ñù.
-- Then the operator norm of A equals the norm of a.
-- Specializes to Euclidean E = Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù.

theorem operator_norm_eq_norm_of_smul_linear_map {E : Type _} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]
  (a : E) (A : ‚Ñù ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] E) (h : ‚àÄ x : ‚Ñù, A x = x ‚Ä¢ a) : ‚à•A‚à• = ‚à•a‚à• := by sorry

import Mathlib

-- Suppose A : L(‚Ñù, E) is defined for x : ‚Ñù by A x = x ‚Ä¢ a for a vector a : E, where E is a normed space over ‚Ñù.
-- Then the operator norm of A equals the norm of a.
-- Specializes to Euclidean E = Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù.

open Real

theorem operator_norm_eq_norm_of_smul_linear_map {E : Type _} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace Real E]
  (a : E) (A : ContinuousLinearMap Real Real E) (h : ‚àÄ x : Real, A x = x ‚Ä¢ a) : ‚ÄñA‚Äñ = ‚Äña‚Äñ := by sorry

import Mathlib

-- Suppose A : L(‚Ñù, E) is defined for x : ‚Ñù by A x = x ‚Ä¢ a for a vector a : E, where E is a normed space over ‚Ñù.
-- Then the operator norm of A equals the norm of a.
-- Specializes to Euclidean E = Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù.

theorem operator_norm_eq_norm_of_smul_linear_map {E : Type _} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]
  [NontriviallyNormedField ‚Ñù]
  (a : E) (A : ‚Ñù ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] E) (h : ‚àÄ x : ‚Ñù, A x = x ‚Ä¢ a) : ‚ÄñA‚Äñ = ‚Äña‚Äñ := by sorry

import Mathlib

-- Suppose A : L(‚Ñù, E) is defined for x : ‚Ñù by A x = x ‚Ä¢ a for a vector a : E, where E is a normed space over ‚Ñù.
-- Then the operator norm of A equals the norm of a.
-- Specializes to Euclidean E = Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù.

theorem operator_norm_eq_norm_of_smul_linear_map {E : Type _} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]
  [NontriviallyNormedField ‚Ñù]
  (a : E) (A : ‚Ñù ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] E) (h : ‚àÄ x : ‚Ñù, A x = x ‚Ä¢ a) :
  ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm A = ‚Äña‚Äñ := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

-- Special case for Euclidean space ‚Ñù^n represented as Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù.

theorem operator_norm_eq_euclidean {n : ‚Ñï} (a : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) (A : ‚Ñù ‚ÜíL[‚Ñù] (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  (h : ‚àÄ x : ‚Ñù, A x = x ‚Ä¢ a) : ContinuousLinearMap.opNorm A = ‚Äña‚Äñ := by sorry
